short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XBOT Battle Helper for Splinterlands. It helps you choose the best team for the battle and includes many QoL features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XBOT Battle Helper extension has 5 features:

• Battle Helper Access (Team Recommendations via XBOT)
• Simulate battle results directly on the battle page
• Change background image on battle page
• Change Game Speed up to 12x
• Auto-start battle
